A '''traitor''' is a [[villager]] in [[25w14craftmine]] that trades [[mine ingredient]]s. It has a [[pillager]] body but still has the villager overlay.

== Spawning ==
An unemployed [[villager]] turns into a traitor when a unclaimed [[lodestone]] is nearby.
